Plot: In 1970, drug-fueled Los Angeles private investigator Larry "Doc" Sportello investigates the disappearance of a former girlfriend.
Title: Inherent Vice
Writer: Paul Thomas Anderson (written for the screen by), Thomas Pynchon (based on the novel by)
Actors: Joanna Newsom, Katherine Waterston, Joaquin Phoenix, Jordan Christian Hearn
tomatoConsensus: Inherent Vice may prove frustrating for viewers who demand absolute coherence, but it does justice to its acclaimed source material -- and should satisfy fans of director P.T. Anderson.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 14 wins & 88 nominations.
